section.title: <vcp:body />
section.para: The <vcp:body /> tag allows to split a template content into parts that are passed to encode() methods and defines when children elements rendering should be invoked:

listitem.para: the template content before the <vcp:body /> tag is inputted into encodeBegin() method
the template content after the <vcp:body /> tag is inputted into encodeEnd() method
on the <vcp:body /> tag the encodeChildren() method is invoked
